channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 30, 2026 Today's Verse Psalm 85:2 [2] You forgave the iniquity of your people; you covered all their sin. Selah This Year's Memory Verses Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable. Today's Westminster Catechism Q/A 30 - How doth the Spirit apply to us the redemption purchased by Christ?
